name: Flood Escape 2
description:
Welcome to Flood Escape 2!

Right now this is alpha.

Instructions:

Arrows to move.

Press the buttons.

Escape from the flood.

Try not to run out of air, which is at the top left corner.

Lag? Go here.

You could also play at Scratch as well.

Note: It might not be playable on the browser.

Right now there are only two maps. one coming soon.

You could play in the browser...

or download the SWF file.

Thanks for playing :)
